name: Zula Türkiye
summary: ZULA or GLADYO? Select your side and start to battle for good! Join ZULA, who fights against secret forces of international organizations or join GLADYO who tries to destroy ZULA!. With authentic local content and textures, Zula recaptures the feel and atmosphere of famous Turkish TV series.

name: The Witcher® 3: Wild Hunt
summary: The Witcher is a story-driven, next-generation open world role-playing game, set in a visually stunning fantasy universe, full of meaningful choices and impactful consequences. In The Witcher, you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter tasked with finding a child from an ancient prophecy.
